sentences.sentence: When she edged in he was enacting the kindly burly pastor, an elbow on the corner of the parlor organ, two fingers playing with his massy watch-chain, his expression benevolent and amused.
sentences.translation: 她怯生生地走进客厅时，他马上摆出一副牧师的善良坦诚的样子，手肘放在客厅里的风琴角上，两根指头摆弄着他那粗粗的表链。样子显得仁慈而又潇洒。
